text: movungē at karana lada (napuru) kriyāvanhi hētuven movunva yamkisi vipatak pæmiṇa sēndu vana viṭa, “apagē deviyanē! apa veta (obagē) ek dūtayeku yæviya yutu novēda? (esē oba yavā tibuṇē nam), obagē āyāvan api anugamanaya kara (obaṭa) viśvāsaya tæbūvangen vū aya vaśayen siṭa ættemu” yayi pavasā nosiṭīma piṇisama, (obava apagē dūtayā vaśayen movun veta yævvemu)
